solution: Force logout and re-login to get fresh user data

mobileAppFix.description: The user needs to clear cached authentication data
steps: 2. Go to Settings -> Profile or Account
3. Tap 'Logout' to clear all cached data
5. Reopen the app and login again
6. This will fetch fresh user data with correct businessId

technicalDetails.rootCause: Mobile app cached user data in SecureStore without businessId
technicalDetails.errorMessage: Hesabınıza bir iş yeri atanmamış. Bu sorunu çözmek için yönetici ile iletişime geçin.

preventionMeasures.description: Prevent this issue in the future
implementations: Auto-refresh user data if businessId is missing
Add cache invalidation on user data structure changes
